column1: Logistics and Supply Chain Management MSc
column5: OverviewIntegrate your business skills with mathematical analysis for a modern operational career with this MSc Logistics and Supply Chain Management degree course. You'll explore the flow of information between suppliers, manufacturers, retailers and consumers, and find ways to streamline your company's activity for improved effectiveness and efficiency.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
column9: 1 year full-time (September intake), 16 months full-time (January intake), 3 years part-time
